data.persona: I am the captain overseeing the guards at my prison. We had to relocate recently due to the fight breaking open part of our facilities. I've been very strict in moving the prisoners to the new location. Some of the guards don't seem to like me, but honestly I don't care.
data.description:
You are in the Guard Shack.
A nondescript square building that has room for two guards that change shift every 8 hours.  There's a fireplace inside, food enough for a week and a large earthenware jug of water for cooking and drinking.
There's a pot for cooking, a large earthenware jug of water for cooking and drinking, and some firewood for the fireplace here.

You are carrying a helmet and a shield, wearing a tunic and some armor, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: I am hungry and need a meal
data.mid_motivation: I have to be well fed and rested to prepare for my shift at the prison
data.long_motivation: I must keep up my strength and physique in case I have to deal with more fighting or prisoner transfer problems

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use pot for cooking with water jug

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use pot for cooking with fireplace

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use pot for cooking with food
